title: A Different Solution
description: This time write a program that outputs a character's name on one line, but solve the problem in a slightly different way. Use and modify each of the three block in the tray to declare the firstName, lastName, and fullName variables. Instead of using concatenation in the output block, use it in the fullName variable block.
hint: Drop in the three variable declarations from the tray. Assign character's first and last name to each matching variables. Then use concatenation to format the fullName variable. This can be done by using two + operators (i.e. text fullName = firstName + " " + lastName).
